name: Vegetarian Fajita Bowl
ingredients: Optional toppings: avocado, salsa, sour cream
instructions: In a large skillet, sauté bell peppers, red onion, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes in olive oil.
Sprinkle fajita seasoning over the vegetables and stir to coat evenly.
Add black beans and cook until heated through.
Serve over cooked rice with optional toppings.
Enjoy your vegetarian fajita bowl!

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a large pan, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque.
Stir in lemon zest, lemon juice, cherry tomatoes, and parsley.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Toss cooked pasta with the shrimp mixture.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.

name: Teriyaki Tofu Stir-Fry
ingredients: 3 cups mixed stir-fry vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and cornstarch to make the sauce.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or skillet over medium-high heat.
Add cubed tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Stir in mixed vegetables and green onions.
Pour the sauce over the tofu and vegetables, stirring to coat evenly.
Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp and the sauce has thickened.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Mango Avocado Salsa Chicken
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Season chicken breasts with cumin, chili powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken breasts until browned on both sides and cooked through.
While the chicken is cooking, prepare the salsa by combining mango, avocado, red onion, jalapeño, lime juice, and cilantro in a bowl.
Serve the chicken topped with mango avocado salsa.
Enjoy your flavorful mango avocado salsa chicken!

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: In a bowl, mix lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Serve with your favorite side dishes.

name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa in vegetable broth according to package instructions.
Let quinoa cool, then fluff with a fork.
In a bowl, combine quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette dressing and toss gently.
Serve chilled.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes.
Cook until garlic is golden, then remove from heat.
Toss cooked spaghetti in the garlic-infused oil.
Garnish with fresh parsley and Parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Coconut Curry Chickpeas
instructions: Sauté chopped onion until translucent.
Add diced tomatoes, curry powder, turmeric, salt, and pepper.
Stir in chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

name: Honey Mustard Glazed Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix Dijon mustard, honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Brush the mixture over salmon fillets.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon flakes easily.
Optional: Broil for an additional 1-2 minutes for a caramelized finish.
Serve with steamed vegetables or rice.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the ripe avocado and spread it evenly on the toasted bread.
Poach the eggs and place one on each avocado-covered toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes if desired.
Garnish with chopped chives and enjoy!

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: In serving glasses or bowls, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries.
Repeat the layers until the glasses are filled.
Drizzle honey over the top and sprinkle with chopped nuts if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious parfait!

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add fresh spinach to the skillet and sauté until wilted.
Pour the whisked eggs over the spinach and sprinkle with feta cheese.
Cook until the eggs are set, then fold the omelette in half.
Garnish with cherry tomatoes and serve hot.

name: Banana Nut Pancakes
ingredients: Butter and maple syrup for serving
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, mix buttermilk, egg, mashed bananas, and chopped nuts.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a griddle or non-stick pan over medium heat and ladle the batter onto it.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with butter and maple syrup.

name: Fruit Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: Toppings: sliced fruits, granola, chia seeds
instructions: In a blender, combine frozen bananas, mixed berries, spinach, Greek yogurt, and almond milk.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the smoothie into bowls and top with sliced fruits, granola, and chia seeds.
Enjoy your nutritious and delicious smoothie bowl!

name: Beef Wellington
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Season beef fillets with salt and black pepper.
Brush with Dijon mustard and wrap each fillet in prosciutto.
Sear in a hot pan until prosciutto is crispy.
Roll out puff pastry and wrap each fillet, sealing the edges.
Brush with beaten egg and bake until pastry is golden brown.
Serve with red wine reduction sauce.

name: Eggs Benedict with Hollandaise Sauce
instructions: Poach the eggs to your liking.
While eggs are poaching, cook Canadian bacon until heated through.
Place a slice of Canadian bacon on each toasted English muffin half.
Top with a poached egg and drizzle with hollandaise sauce.
Garnish with chopped chives and serve immediately.

name: Sushi Rolls with Spicy Tuna
ingredients: Pickled ginger and wasabi for serving
instructions: Prepare sushi rice according to package instructions.
Place a nori sheet on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a thin layer of rice on the nori, leaving a border at the top.
Add diced tuna and drizzle with spicy mayo.
Roll the sushi tightly and slice into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

name: Lobster Thermidor
instructions: Boil lobster tails until cooked; remove meat and chop into chunks.
In a saucepan, melt butter and stir in flour to create a roux.
Gradually whisk in milk until smooth and thickened.
Add Gruyere and Parmesan cheeses, a spoonful of Dijon mustard, and lobster chunks.
Spoon the mixture back into lobster shells and broil until golden brown.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

name: Croissants with Almond Filling
instructions: In a bowl, combine warm milk, active dry yeast, and granulated sugar. Let it sit for 5 minutes until foamy.
In a large bowl, mix flour and salt. Cut in cold butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add the yeast mixture to the flour and knead until a dough forms. Chill for 1 hour.
Roll out the dough, fold in thirds, and chill for 30 minutes. Repeat this process three times.
Mix almond paste and powdered sugar to make the filling.
Roll out the dough, spread the almond filling, and roll into a log.
Cut into croissants, let rise for 1 hour, brush with egg wash, and bake until golden brown.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté sliced chicken in butter until cooked.
Add minced garlic, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is melted.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Toss the cooked pasta in the Alfredo sauce, garnish with parsley, and serve hot.

name: Shrimp and Asparagus Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 lb asparagus (trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces)
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch.
In a wok or skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until pink; remove from the pan.
Stir-fry asparagus, garlic, and ginger until asparagus is crisp-tender.
Add the cooked shrimp back to the pan, pour the sauce over, and toss to coat.
Serve over rice.

name: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 4 large bell peppers (halved and seeds removed)
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook quinoa in vegetable broth according to package instructions.
In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cumin, chili powder, salt, and black pepper.
Stuff each bell pepper half with the quinoa mixture.
Top with shredded cheese and bake for 25-30 minutes or until peppers are tender.
Serve hot.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Pat the chicken dry with paper towels and season with salt and black pepper.
In a bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, and olive oil.
Rub the chicken with the herb mixture and place lemon halves in the cavity.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and pour chicken broth into the pan.
Roast for about 1 hour or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Let it rest for 10 minutes before carving.

name: Butternut Squash Risotto
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a pan, sauté chopped onion and minced garlic in olive oil until translucent.
Add Arborio rice and cook until the edges become translucent.
Pour in the white wine and stir until mostly absorbed.
Add diced butternut squash and ladle in hot vegetable broth one scoop at a time, stirring until absorbed.
Continue this process until the rice and squash are creamy and tender.
Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese, season with salt and black pepper.
Garnish with fresh sage leaves and serve.

name: Cajun Shrimp and Grits
instructions: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan. Stir in grits and cook according to package instructions.
Stir in shredded cheddar cheese and butter into the cooked grits.
In a skillet, heat olive oil and cook shrimp with Cajun seasoning until pink and opaque.
Serve the Cajun shrimp over a bed of cheesy grits.
Top with crumbled bacon and chopped green onions.

name: Thai Green Curry with Chicken
instructions: In a pot, heat coconut milk and green curry paste until fragrant.
Add sliced chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in bamboo shoots, bell peppers, and eggplant.
Season with fish sauce, soy sauce, and brown sugar.
Simmer until the vegetables are tender and the chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve over rice.

name: Peach and Prosciutto Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large bowl, combine arugula, sliced peaches, prosciutto, and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Toss the salad gently to coat the ingredients.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with toasted pine nuts and serve immediately.

name: Teriyaki Glazed Salmon
ingredients: Sesame seeds and green onions for garnish
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, sesame oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger.
Marinate salmon fillets in the teriyaki sauce for 10-15 minutes.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Cook salmon fillets for 3-4 minutes per side or until golden and cooked through.
Drizzle with extra teriyaki sauce if desired.
Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.

name: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: Red pepper flakes and parsley for garnish
instructions: Cook linguine pasta according to package instructions.
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink; remove shrimp and set aside.
Deglaze the skillet with chicken broth and lemon juice.
Toss cooked pasta and shrimp in the sauce.
Garnish with red pepper flakes and parsley.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
In a bowl, mix ricotta, half of the mozzarella, Parmesan, and egg.
In a baking dish, layer noodles, ricotta mixture, vegetables, and marinara sauce.
Repeat layers, ending with a layer of sauce and mozzarella on top.
Bake until bubbly and golden brown.
Garnish with fresh basil and let it rest before slicing.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or skillet over high heat.
Add sliced chicken and stir-fry until cooked.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot; stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Mix in teriyaki sauce and soy sauce.
Serve over rice or noodles.

name: Roasted Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss butternut squash, onion, and carrots with olive oil, cumin, and cinnamon.
Roast in the oven until vegetables are tender and caramelized.
Blend roasted vegetables with vegetable broth until smooth.
Transfer to a pot, season with salt and black pepper, and heat through.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

name: Caprese Quinoa Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Extra virgin olive oil for drizzling
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and chopped basil.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Season with salt and black pepper, toss to combine.
Serve at room temperature or chilled.

name: Sesame Ginger Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, honey, and grated ginger.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet and brush with the sauce.
Sprinkle sesame seeds over the salmon.
Bake until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

name: Mushroom and Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a skillet, sauté mushrooms, spinach, and garlic in olive oil until wilted.
Let the mixture cool, then stir in crumbled feta cheese.
Butterfly each chicken breast and stuff with the mushroom-spinach mixture.
Secure with toothpicks, season with salt and black pepper.
Bake until chicken is cooked through.
Remove toothpicks before serving.

name: Cauliflower and Chickpea Curry
instructions: In a large pot, sauté chopped onion and minced garlic until softened.
Add curry powder, cumin, turmeric, and cayenne pepper; cook for 1-2 minutes.
Stir in chopped tomatoes, cauliflower, and chickpeas.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until cauliflower is tender.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve over rice.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa and Black Beans
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, salsa, cumin, and chili powder.
Stuff each bell pepper half with the quinoa mixture.
Top with shredded cheddar cheese.
Bake until peppers are tender and cheese is melted.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve.

name: Lemon Garlic Roast Chicken
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rinse the chicken and pat it dry with paper towels.
Rub the chicken with olive oil, minced garlic, dried thyme, dried rosemary, salt, and black pepper.
Place lemon slices under the skin and inside the cavity of the chicken.
Roast in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, basting with chicken broth every 20 minutes.
Allow the chicken to rest before carving.
Serve with pan drippings.

name: Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Season salmon fillets with salt and black pepper.
In a skillet, heat olive oil and sear the salmon fillets until golden brown on both sides.
Add minced garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, chopped dill, chicken broth, and heavy cream to the skillet.
Simmer until the sauce thickens and the salmon is cooked through.
Serve hot, drizzling the lemon-dill sauce over the salmon.

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: In a large pan, sauté cumin seeds, cloves, and cardamom pods until fragrant.
Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown.
Stir in ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, garam masala, and cook until tomatoes are soft.
Mix in plain yogurt, mixed vegetables, mint leaves, and cilantro. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
Layer the cooked basmati rice over the vegetable mixture and steam for 10 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with additional mint and cilantro.

name: Blueberry Oatmeal Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine blueberries, rolled oats, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes if desired and blend again.
Pour into glasses and enjoy your nutritious blueberry oatmeal smoothie!

name: Egg and Veggie Breakfast Burrito
instructions: In a pan, sauté bell pepper and onion until softened.
Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked.
Stir in diced tomato and shredded cheese until melted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon the egg mixture onto flour tortillas, roll into burritos, and serve with salsa.

name: Banana Walnut Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, mix mashed bananas, melted butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients, then fold in chopped walnuts.
Spoon the batter into muffin cups and bake for 20-25 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Allow to cool before serving.

name: Chia Seed Pudding with Berries
instructions: In a bowl, mix chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract.
Stir well, cover, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight until the mixture thickens.
Before serving, stir the pudding and top with mixed berries.
Enjoy your nutritious chia seed pudding with berries!

name: Vegetarian Breakfast Burrito Bowl
ingredients: 1/2 cup black beans (canned, drained, and rinsed)
instructions: In each bowl, layer cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, sliced avocado, and fried or poached eggs.
Top with salsa and garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve your delicious vegetarian breakfast burrito bowl!

name: Pancakes with Mixed Berry Compote
ingredients: Mixed berries for compote (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, mix buttermilk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a griddle or non-stick pan over medium heat and ladle the batter onto it.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side.
In a saucepan, simmer mixed berries until they release their juices to make the compote.
Serve pancakes with the mixed berry compote and maple syrup.

name: Avocado and Egg Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a pan over medium heat until cooked.
Warm the tortillas in a dry pan or microwave.
Layer each tortilla with scrambled eggs, avocado slices, cherry tomatoes, and crumbled feta.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and fold the tortillas into wraps.
Enjoy your avocado and egg breakfast wrap!

name: Chocolate Banana Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: Sliced banana and strawberries for topping
instructions: In a blender, combine frozen bananas, cocoa powder, and almond milk.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the smoothie into bowls and top with granola, sliced banana, strawberries, and chocolate chips.
Enjoy your chocolate banana smoothie bowl!

name: Egg White Veggie Omelette
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a bowl, whisk the egg whites until frothy.
In a non-stick skillet, sauté bell pepper, red onion, and spinach in olive oil until softened.
Pour the whisked egg whites over the veggies and cook until set.
Add sliced cherry tomatoes and fold the omelette in half.
Season with salt and black pepper, garnish with fresh herbs, and serve hot.

name: Cinnamon French Toast Sticks
instructions: Cut each slice of bread into sticks.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, sugar, and ground cinnamon.
Dip each bread stick into the egg mixture, coating all sides.
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat and cook the bread sticks until golden brown on all sides.
Serve the cinnamon French toast sticks with maple syrup for dipping.

name: Greek Yogurt and Berry Parfait
instructions: In serving glasses or bowls, layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola.
Repeat the layers until the glasses are filled.
Drizzle honey over the top and garnish with chopped mint leaves.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delightful Greek yogurt and berry parfait!

name: Vegetarian Breakfast Quesadilla
ingredients: 1 cup black beans (canned, drained, and rinsed)
instructions: In a pan, cook scrambled eggs until just set.
On a tortilla, layer black beans, scrambled eggs, diced bell peppers, and shredded cheddar cheese.
Top with another tortilla and cook on both sides until the cheese is melted and the tortillas are golden brown.
Repeat for the second quesadilla.
Serve with salsa and garnish with avocado slices.

name: Cranberry Orange Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Alternate adding the dry ingredients and orange juice to the butter mixture, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients.
Fold in dried cranberries, orange zest, and vanilla extract.
Spoon the batter into muffin cups and bake for 20-25 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Allow to cool before serving.

name: Spinach and Mushroom Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a pan, sauté mushrooms until they release their moisture.
Add fresh spinach leaves and cook until wilted.
Pour scrambled eggs into the pan and cook until just set.
Divide the egg mixture between two whole wheat tortillas.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese on top, season with salt and black pepper, and fold into wraps.
Serve with salsa and enjoy your spinach and mushroom breakfast wrap!

name: Almond Butter and Banana Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine ripe bananas, almond butter, almond milk, Greek yogurt, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes if desired and blend again.
Pour into glasses and enjoy your delicious almond butter and banana smoothie!

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season chicken breasts with salt, black pepper, and olive oil.
Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Slice the grilled chicken into strips.
In a large bowl, combine chopped Romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Add the grilled chicken strips and drizzle with Caesar dressing.
Toss well and serve your delicious Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad!

name: Vegetarian Chickpea and Quinoa Bowl
ingredients: Olive oil and lemon juice dressing
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Add crumbled feta cheese and Kalamata olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice dressing.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh parsley and enjoy your Vegetarian Chickpea and Quinoa Bowl!

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio with Shrimp
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté sliced garlic until golden brown.
Add red pepper flakes and shrimp; cook until shrimp are pink and opaque.
Toss the cooked spaghetti in the pan, coating it with the garlic and shrimp mixture.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Caprese Salad Sandwich
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Drizzle olive oil on one side of each ciabatta slice.
On two slices, layer tomato, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and black pepper.
Top with the remaining slices of ciabatta, olive oil side down.
Press the sandwiches together and serve your delightful Caprese Salad Sandwich!
